title: ‘The Rings of Power’ Is a New Kind of Blockbuster TV
description:
Chris and Andy talk about all the pop culture news that came out of the 2022 Super Bowl including the halftime show that featured several rappers loved by Gen X (1:03), the trailer for the new ‘Doctor Strange’ movie (18:20), and the first official trailer for ‘The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power’ (31:44).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
